website_summaries.verdict: An elegant and functional comforter set that can be reversed to offer a 2-in-1 set.
pros: A well-made bedding set that's soft, light, and comfortable
Included in this eight piece set are two small pillows, two shams, two euro square pillow cases, a comforter, and a bed skirt
cons: Users report parts of this set can melt when tumble dried at high heat

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this over a month ago and it has been a very nice addition to our bedroom. Not too light and not too heavy! Great product for the money! It did come with all the pieces advertised. I had read a review that claimed it had fewer items than advertised but I recieved all items and love the matching pillows that come with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kvb

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this product. Sure it isn't as fancy as a more expensive comforter but for the price it does the trick. My only note is that if you have a large mattress, I have a Tempur Pedic, you should size up. I bought the King size for my King mattress and it doesn't cover all the way down the sides. I can still see some of my sheets. But it will work for now. It really is a nice package for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is a good value
customer_reviews.text: This was as nice as it looks in the photo's. I got this for my daughter who lives in another state so I didn't get to see it right away. I went for a visit when she had her second baby and I was surprised to see this look as nice as it did in the photos online. It is a decent weight for a light weight comforter and I thought relatively well constructed compared to other comforters you can get at the same price in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: Beware King Size
customer_reviews.text: Update: Unique Home has personally taken the time to reach out to me to either replace or refund the amount of the comforter. I opt d to refund as I have a King size bed and replacement may not make a difference. However I highly advise this print, it’s good quality - just order a King if you have a Queen size bed! I have a king sized mattress and found that this comforter seems more like a Queen. The King does not cover both sides of the mattress. It is not big enough to be considered a King. So disappointing as it matched my shower curtain perfectly and I appreciated the reverse option.
customer_reviews.author: LoftonFam

customer_reviews.title: 0 Stars would accurately describe item (just received items as ...
customer_reviews.text: 0 Stars would accurately describe item (just received items as a set today.) The "8 piece set" arrived in 1 bag labeled "7 piece set" (see my attached picture.) This is without a doubt the cheapest made bedroom set I have ever encountered. All other reviews have to be scam reviews. No one could honestly rate this set higher than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Burch

customer_reviews.title: Better then I thought
customer_reviews.text: My husband picked this out thinking I would like it, I was frustrated at first because when it comes to bedding I like to get it in a store to I can feel the qulity. I thought that the gathering spots of the faberic was going to easily rip and we would have to get a new one in a few weeks. I was wrong! The fabric is gathered by elastic so it can stretch. It is a decent quality, definitely not high end but not cheaply made either. The color is true to the pic advertised. The pillows are cute, the bedding is pretty, it’s comfortable, it keeps me warm. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Platform bed: king size
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this comforter set. The fabric is soft and arrived without any flaws. We have a king size platform bed (with a pillow top mattress) and ordered the king sized comforter - it fits! I had been watching a comforter set from JCP which was several hundred dollars for months trying to catch a good sale. Found this set for so much less. Would definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, however this comforter does not draped over entire bed, and is only wide enough to cover the top of my mattress. The sizing is not a good fit . It leaves my sheets / mattress exposed on both sides . Not pleased with the fitting and does not fit like picture shown Update , company sent me a replacement . As it is wider than my first order , it covers past both sides of my king size bed . It still does not hang to floor like picture states . I am happy with replacement !
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty okay :)
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a thick warm comforter this is not the one for you ..pretty thin. Nice for summertime . Akward shaped pillowcases ..overall its okay . I will keep and use untill winter . The blanket is cute
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bedding
customer_reviews.text: The pillows look like they are a little sad and the egdes on them don't stand straight so it doesn't look super clean. Also the width on the bedspread seems to be missing a few inches. Awkward length, however I feel like I can't complain that much since it was so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: OK quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality comforter I've ever had, but it does look nice on my bed. I had hoped that it would be softer and have more of a sheen. Instead, it feels somewhat cheap and low quality, but it does its job and the matching pillows are nice. Fits well on my king sized bed with plenty of overhang.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Would make purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a King size bed, for the price we paid I was worrisome that we would be getting a cheap quality set. This was not the case I am very happy with the fabric and the actual print side feel different from the decor side, but does not bother us much. The only qualm I have is that it does fit a bit small not sure if it is due to the thickness of our mattress but comforter does not hang past down mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It's Falling Apart!
customer_reviews.text: I love it but we've had it less than a month and it's falling apart! The stitching has come apart on both throw pillows and on a section of the comforter. Also, the bed skirt doesn't have a slit on the bottom sides. So, you can really only only put in on a bed with a frame only - not a bed with a footboard.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, have not washed it yet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, have not washed it yet. Only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is I have a queen size bed, but ordered a King so it would hang over the sides more. I'm glad I did because a queen would not have been big enough for my bed. Will update if after washing it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as advertised
customer_reviews.text: On the fence about this comforter set. While I love the color and the design, and it is very soft, it is much shorter than the picture suggests if you purchase the king size. The sides don't reach the floor and barely cover the sides of the mattress. The material feels very thin and seems like it will tear easily. Also, the filling feels and sounds (it makes a rustling sound like dry leaves when moved) like it is filled with little bits of paper. Not what I expected. We will probably be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: TheToddlesons

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple months now and I couldn't be more happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this comforter set for a couple months now and I couldn't be more happy with it. I did go ahead and order a king size for my queen bed and I'm glad I did. The only thing about doing that is the bed skirt is too big and I needed to get king size pillows for the shams.
customer_reviews.author: Lku23

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED this comforter set
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this comforter set. It was light weight, soft and looked so good in my room. That said, after one wash the stuffing began to bunch up and separate. I even made sure to wash it on gentle cycle, and dried it on the lowest heat setting (which took FOREVER) and it still managed to ruin the material. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanea

customer_reviews.title: Great bedding set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking set. Love the color and the feel. It is soft. Per other reviews, did buy a king size for a queen size bed to make sure that it fits the bed well and it falls to the sides. It looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Alvarenga

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, I did not receive the shams and only ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, I did not receive the shams and only 2 of the three pillows. I'm going to try and contact the company. It's a nice looking set, but like I said very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: ... crinkled look that makes the made bed not look perfect, which is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: It has a crinkled look that makes the made bed not look perfect, which is a good thing. Also, I have a cat, so that if she should pick it with her claws, it is not noticeable. It is light, which I like. Wished it had one more small pillow. Two is odd looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy but great material for the right amount of warmth and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very soft! Not too heavy but great material for the right amount of warmth and comfort. Also not cheap material. Came with everything described and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Bed in a bag is always hit or miss... This is an 8 peice and all of the peices are awesome! Decent quality looks like it's heavy but it's very light weight and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice but the was hoping that it would look exactly like the picture. For one the picture has the sides hitting the floor and it kinda looks like the material is a little slikey but it’s not at all. And I request for my delivery to be delivered to my job witch is like 200 ft from my house and it was still left outside on my porch till 9pm due to me getting off at 9! But overall it’s a cute bedset, also I didn’t realize it didn’t come with sheets lol
customer_reviews.author: Shaikee

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully plush and super soft
customer_reviews.text: This set is simply Gorgeous and well made! I love it !!! Transformed my bedroom . I Love Love Love this set !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly skeptical about this when reading the reviews, but I'm extremely glad i decided to purchase! For the price, this is a great set. I washed everything before putting it on my bed and everything held up perfect. It gives a very elegant touch, which is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I wasn't expecting this great of a quality for the price but i was surprised when i opened the packaging. I'm very happy with the way it looks on our King size bed! Only one thing i found was that the comforter doesn't cover the entire bed fully, but overall extremely happy with this product. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to, favorite comforter. It’s so light and soft. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The set came with everything listed in the advertisement (comforter, bed ruffle, two small pillows, two regular pillow cases, and two square pillow cases - 8 pieces). The comforter felt thinner at first but it actually is very warm (usually I have a sheet, a small blanket and a comforter) and I have no need for that extra blanket. The comforter is also much softer than expected. It's a lovely gray color that we accented with red pillows. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: The Boldens

customer_reviews.title: Faded after washing 1st time!
customer_reviews.text: Washed it when I received it on hand wash cycle and dried it on low and the decorative side of the pillow cases and the comforter faded in some spots. I cant seem to figure out how to upload a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and its a great quality
customer_reviews.text: While it’s definitely a cute set, mine seems to conduct A LOT of static. Could just be my house and area. Love the design and its a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think likely
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than expected. Doesn't look as good as pictures by far
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: FABRIC VERY LIMP AND WRINKLES EASILY....
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the ad. However the edging around the pillow shams is very limp and folds over when you stand them up. It is because the fabric is so soft. Also the fabric wrinkles very easily. I would definately not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is a really soft and beautiful bedroom set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really soft and beautiful bedroom set, but if you ever have to wash it be careful because the cotton on the inside shifts so much it crates a lumpy look. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: LauraWilson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, so happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is so soft and just as nice as the picture shows. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set, very soft
customer_reviews.text: beautiful set, very soft, very comfortable, washes very well...was originally ordering this just to have a back up set but then loved how it looked and use it full time now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Watson

customer_reviews.title: No fitted sheet?
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bedding!!! Has a beautiful classy look to it~ Only wish they had a fitted sheet with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Magee

customer_reviews.title: ... top of the comforter I found stains which looked like blood. I took the pillowcases out and one ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my set today and at the top of the comforter I found stains which looked like blood. I took the pillowcases out and one of them had two very large holes. The throw pillows are very poorly put together. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, not full king size, not as pictured and very thin.
customer_reviews.author: eryn coverdale

customer_reviews.title: color was perfect. I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Comforter is very soft and light but is also warm. color was perfect. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY KINCAID

customer_reviews.title: Great design, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set for the price! Stiching is good, all pillows came in good condition. Very nice design, elegant and soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking blanket
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Love that it is reversable. Everything came as it was discribed. Nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the quality of this set
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of this set,it was just what I wanted and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Sure it's pretty and nice but not created to last
customer_reviews.text: Sure it's pretty and nice but not created to last. ONE wash and a pillow is completely unraveled... worthless. Granted I should have known as the quilt came frayed in certain spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this is Grey and am disappointed it is a purple color. The shams that came with it are grey so they don't match. I did get all the advertised pieces but the colors don't match. The comforter is super soft and everything that I want. Wish it matched
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is not soft and is actually scratchy and noisy, even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J

customer_reviews.title: ... before i bought this set and was a little disappointed, its a little small for my king size
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before i bought this set and was a little disappointed, its a little small for my king size, but so nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Abanto

customer_reviews.title: King sized bedding
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe it is so lovely for the price. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I received this today, and I was so excited to open it. I was sadly disappointed when I finally opened it, and learned that it was of poor quality. There were snags in many places, the comforter had spots that didn't have stuffing, and the material includes different color greys. If I could give 0 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: ALoz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Has held up well and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rife

customer_reviews.title: It is very thin and cheap feeling. I washed ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very thin and cheap feeling. I washed it for the first time, to soften it up, and on one end it fell apart and has holes. Also the sewing of the seam has areas that is sewn out and the remaining seam is sewn inward.
customer_reviews.author: Buy true to size

customer_reviews.title: An okay product
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt was ripped but the other items were ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost reflected in quality.
customer_reviews.text: The tuck pleats are much less dramatic in person, and the material feels cheap. Guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I’ve had it for about 6 months now and it’s still perfect
customer_reviews.author: austin Blayer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for the first month and then the stitching ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the first month and then the stitching started coming out of the "pinched" part of the comforter. So disappointing because it's a really elegant looking comforter. Won't be buying again, wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the detail!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the whole set! Just to let you know the pillows shown are pretty accurate as to the size of a pillow case you get. My pillows were too small so it was just an excuse for me to but bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Estela

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!! I was very hesitant because of some of the poorer reviews but I’m so glad I ordered it. I purchased the king for a queen size bed so it can hang over more, just had to pin the bed skirt to fit. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Love the set for the price. I like to change my bedding often and found that you don’t have to spend a fortune to find something nice. Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tlynn

customer_reviews.title: We followed all care instructions and we disappointed to notice a tear today
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this about a month ago, and it has already ripped. We followed all care instructions and we disappointed to notice a tear today.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: For the price of a king size with pillows it’s great. It’s not very soft and I can tell it won’t last that long
customer_reviews.author: Vorster Family

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my new bed set ! Great quality. Soft to the touch. I love that it is reversible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think the bedding is very attractive, however it ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the bedding is very attractive, however it was not as high quality as I had hoped. The seams seem to be coming undone along the edges of the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: While cover was soft, the interior stuffing literally made a 'crispy' noise when touched. Very very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J Jackson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned without entirely unpacking. Has a rough and cheap feel to it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bedspread is beautiful but is very thin so if you are the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bedspread is beautiful but is very thin so if you are the type of person who gets cold this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously soft and gorgeous too!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Great product at a great price. And so soft! Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Horrible material...
customer_reviews.text: Looks grate however its microfiber and it is bad quality
customer_reviews.author: rumyana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just what I needed to bring the room together!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but there are random little pink stains on the top corner of the comforter. Disappointed to see this on something I spent $70 for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comforter was nice, but not as soft and warm as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Comforter was nice, but not as soft and warm as I would've expected. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, It looks exactly like the picture but the material is light, not a heavy comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is so soft. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it makes out suite truly a romantic get away
customer_reviews.author: Pat Dye

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Bedding
customer_reviews.text: The bedding was not as heavy or as thick as I thought it would be. However, it turned out to be a plus. Very easy to store, looks great on the bed. Not to hot when sleeping. Has a very crisp look.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M

customer_reviews.title: Not a fluffy comforter
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to wash mine yet so I don't know how it holds up on that end. But seems very thin and flat to me. Maybe because i'm used to down soft fluffy comforters and this one is not fluffy at all ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I love this ensemble, it was well worth the price. It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: gwenwalker

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Received item 2 weeks late and now I can't return it! Poor quality and cheaply made. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Even paying the 70 dollar price I could live with a piece missing if it was a good quality set
customer_reviews.text: I am severely unsatisfied with the quality of this product. The title suggests that this is an 8 piece set when it is actually a 7 piece set. Even paying the 70 dollar price I could live with a piece missing if it was a good quality set, however it immediately fell apart in the wash. All the stuffing bunched up it tore in one of the corners and the ruffles are trying to pull apart. I gave it two stars instead of one because it is still useable although it's condition suggests years of use rather than a brand new blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price...nice and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this comforter set! It is very cozy and not too heavy as we are "hot" sleepers. It came with everything as listed. I am excited waiting for the new pillows I ordered to go with the set. You need to have 2 26x26 Euro pillow inserts for the king size. My only minimal complaint is that the two little decorative pillows are very small for King size. Maybe it will look different once I get all of the proper pillows set up. But so far it is great...fast delivery and excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the comforter for two years. At first I was very pleased with the comforter as it was soft, fairly warm, and beautiful. But after a year of washing it monthly, the blanket has unraveled in places, become threadbare, and doesn't provide any heat as it's become so thin. This should happen with a comforter after a dozen or two washes. I'm disappointed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mayer Family

customer_reviews.title: Every wash made it better. We now use the the set regularly
customer_reviews.text: We originally were unhappy with the stiffness of the product. Every wash made it better. We now use the the set regularly. Especially, since it is reversable. Reversing the quilt or the pillow cases adds multiple combinations. Excellent customer service. Particularly, we appreciated the quickness of delivery. Also, the large pillow cases are a bonus. Including matching throw pillows is a nice touch. Definitely, consider buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: trying to help

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover the bed like the picture. Much smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase for the most part. I only have one complaint. It does not cover or fit the bed like it shows in the picture. I will take responsibility for not checking the measurements listed as well as the mistake of trusting the picture. I wanted the look of the picture but it doesn't come near that. Barely reaches the end of the mattress on the sides and foot. Overall, I like the quality and the look. However, I haven't washed it yet. So I do not know how it will hold up. I just wish it was true to the picture😬
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I thought the king would fit my bed like the photo
customer_reviews.text: I thought the king would fit my bed like the photo, NOT! The picture is clearly a king on a full/queen bed. 2 of the four pillowcases are for square pillows, all mine are rectangle typical king pillows. Not as glamorous as it looks but decent.
customer_reviews.author: pamela whitt

customer_reviews.title: comes apart easily but nice until you wash it
customer_reviews.text: beautiful blanket, and soft however after the first wash the thread is already coming apart and the bunching looks bad. Wouldn't buy again, too lazy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and it very warm but it is too small. I would not consider this a king size comforter because it barely reaches the sides of the king size mattress
customer_reviews.author: Ewh88

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a California King. Cheaply made. The throw pillows are very small and cheap looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Crss

customer_reviews.title: Its ok!
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, does not flow over like the one in the picture. We have a king size bed and I was wanting it for just that effect. I will have to order a Cali King for that effect I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Only 7 Pieces/Not 8
customer_reviews.text: I received everything EXCEPT the bed skirt. Too much of a pain to return the whole package for just the bed skirt. ALSO, it comes with 2 EURO shams--I had to order pillows to fit these shams.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Plaizier

customer_reviews.title: but I liked it enough to keep it
customer_reviews.text: The batting was all bunched up near the top of the comforter, but I liked it enough to keep it. It really is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi_T

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bedding. Exactly what I was looking for! So comfy and soft and really pretty. Love the pillowcases too. And the color!!! So so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good blanket for all seasons except for winter......unless your heat is on high. Good color and soft
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Collins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but poor quality. Have had it for less than 6 months and only washed it 2 or 3 times and already it has holes and the filling is bunching up.
customer_reviews.author: Ak mom

customer_reviews.title: Love...nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Soft, but warm enough... I like that it is not heavy, but still warm on those chilly nights...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my queen size bed
customer_reviews.text: The King fits a queen size bed. I am having to purchase another bigger one in order to make it work. However, it is cozy, warm, soft and beautiful and I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: SusanBMc

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Keeps me very warm. I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bedding! So cute on my bed and easy to wash. Goes great with white or gray sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Nilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Small
customer_reviews.text: I like this blanket and the pinch pleat design is nice. However, it is not the over-sized, draping look you see in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Barton

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this bedding and the price was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bedding and the price was good. Wish it was not as lightweight but it will be good for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I definitely got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I definitely got what I paid for. I'm not thrilled with this bedset, but it will do its job - the comforter got snagged during its first trip through the washer & dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is best during fall/winter season
customer_reviews.text: This is best during fall/winter season. Comforter gets too hot in the summer. Other than that it's a great set!
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for what I received. Bedding is soft and will order again
customer_reviews.author: Christina Riggs

product_meta.title: Unique Home Queen Comforter Duvet Insert White All Season Alternative Goose Down Comforter Plush Fiberfill
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:WhiteComforter set will work in any bedroom. With its natural and soft looks, made up of beautiful pin tucks. The reversible pattern will add sophistication to any bedroom. This set is made up of polyester and is conveniently machine washable.
feature_bullets: 3pc set includes - 1 alternative goose down comforter + 2 pillow case
Care instruction: Machine wash gentle cycle with cold water
